description:
The Grand Fisher appears before Ichigo and his friends.  He is a Hollow who uses a lure to seek out humans with strong spiritual energy. Ichigo is shocked when he sees the lure.  It has the shape of the young girl he saw six years ago when his mother died.  Filled with rage and disbelief, he attacks the Grand Fisher.  But losing his calm makes Ichigo easy prey... and even Rukia who comes to Ichigo`s rescue is thrown aside.
Source: crunchyroll
